import React ,{useState, Fragment} from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [ formData , setFormData ] = useState({ compangy:'', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills:'', githubusername: '', bio:'', twitter:'', facebook:'', linkedin: '', youtube:'', instagram: '' }); const [ displaySocialInputs , toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false) const { compangy, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData , [e.target.name] : [e.target.value ]}); return (

Create Your Profile

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{/* if true then display(Fragment) */} { displaySocialInputs && (
)} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { } export default connect()(CreateProfile) //rafcp
